record.title: REMOVAL OF NAMES OF MEMBERS AS COSPONSORS OF H.R. 1396
record.narrative:
REMOVAL OF NAMES OF MEMBERS AS COSPONSORS OF H.R. 1396 -- (House of Representatives - October 18, 2007)

[Page: H11759]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, as a sponsor of H.R. 1396, and because we inadvertently transposed some numbers, I ask unanimous consent that Representatives Nita Lowey, Richard Neal, and Artur Davis be removed as cosponsors of H.R. 1396.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentlewoman from California?
